name: @commercetools-frontend/actions-global
description: Global redux actions for a MC application

scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js  -f cjs index.js -o dist/actions-global.cjs.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js  -f es index.js -o dist/actions-global.es.js
